verificacao: Documentos de saída tributados (NF-e) não escriturados no LRS
consulta:
SELECT nfe.chave as "Chave", nfe.emissao AS "Emissão", 
	CASE WHEN length(trim(cnpj_dest)) = 0 THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN is_cpf(cnpj_dest) THEN REPLACE(to_char(cnpj_dest::bigint, '000:000:000-00'),':','.') ELSE REPLACE(to_char(cnpj_dest::bigint, '00:000:000/0000-00'),':','.') END END as "CNPJ/CPF Destinatário",  
	razao_social_dest AS "Razão Social Destinatário", uf_dest AS "UF Destinatário", 
	modelo as "Modelo", NUMERO as "Número", serie as "Série", 
	natureza_operacao AS "Natureza Operação", Total_NFe as "Total NFe", 
	nfe_item.item AS "Item", nfe_item.desc_produto AS "Descrição Produto",
	nfe_item.icms_bc as "BC ICMS", aliq.aliquota AS "Alíquota ICMS", nfe_item.icms as "ICMS"
FROM NFE
	JOIN nfe_item
		JOIN cfop ON nfe_item.cfop = cfop.codigo
	ON nfe.chave = nfe_item.chave
	JOIN cadesp 
		JOIN cadesp_regime ON cadesp.ie = cadesp_regime.ie
	ON nfe.cnpj_emit = cadesp.cnpj
	JOIN icms_aliq_inter_ufs AS aliq ON nfe.uf_dest = aliq.uf_destino AND nfe.uf_emit = aliq.uf_origem
	LEFT JOIN reg_c100 AS efd ON (NFE.CHAVE = EFD.CHV_NFE OR (efd.cod_mod = '55'  AND efd.cod_sit != '05' AND nfe.numero = efd.num_doc::integer AND nfe.serie = efd.ser::integer))
WHERE nfe.cnpj_emit = CNPJ_AUDITORIA()
AND nfe.emissao BETWEEN 
	greatest(cadesp_regime.inicio_regime, inicio_auditoria()) AND least(COALESCE(cadesp_regime.fim_regime, now()), fim_auditoria())
AND cadesp_regime.regime = 'RPA'
AND SITUACAO_DOCUMENTO = 0
and tipo_doc_fiscal = 'Saída'
and (nfe_item.icms_bc > 0 OR nfe_item.icmsst_bc > 0)
AND nfe_item.cfop NOT IN (5605,5929)
AND efd.id IS NULL
ORDER BY emissao, nfe.chave, nfe_item.item ASC
